#summary Frequently Asked Questions about the GWT bindings for Gadgets

= Gadgets  FAQs =

These FAQs refer to the Google API Library for GWT bindings for the Gadgets API.  See also [FAQ_Intro General FAQs] for general FAQs on the Google API Library for GWT.

== Why doesn't the sample work in hosted mode? ==

A Gadget must be hosted in a GWT container before it can be run in hosted mode.  See [GadgetsGettingStarted Getting Started with Gadgets].
